pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plugin for the nose testing framework for running tests in a subprocess.Use ``nosetests --with-process-isolation`` to enable the plugin. When enabled,each test is run in a separate process.Additionally add the ``--with-process-isolation-individual`` option and decoratetop level test functions or classes with ``@nosepipe.isolate`` to only run thosetests in isolation.Supports Python 2 and 3.
